pages.md:
# The Command Dials

The rear and front command dials are used for the operations below.

!Front and Rear Command Dials

| Mode      | Front Command Dial Operations                                                                 | Rear Command Dial Operations                  |
|-----------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------|
| **AUTO**  | Choose an auto/scene mode.                                                                    |                                               |
| **P**     | Choose the desired combination of shutter speed and aperture (program shift).                 | Adjust exposure compensation.                 |
| **S**     | Choose a shutter speed.                                                                       |                                               |
| **A**     | Adjust aperture.Â²                                                                             |                                               |
| **M**     | Adjust aperture.Â²                                                                             | Choose a shutter speed.                       |
| **FILTER**| Program shift.                                                                                | Adjust exposure compensation.                 |
| **Menus** | Select menu tabs or page through menus.                                                       | Highlight menu items.                         |
| **Q Menu**| Select items in the quick menu.                                                               | Adjust settings in the quick menu.            |
| **Playback** | View other pictures.                                                                       | - Zoom in or out (full-frame playback).       |
|           |                                                                                               | - Zoom in or out (multi-frame playback).      |

1. Can be changed using **BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > COMMAND DIAL SETTING**.
2. Applies if the lens has no aperture ring or if an aperture ring with an "A" position is in the **A** position.

> ðŸ’¡ **Note:**  
> The rotation direction for the command dials can be selected using **BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > COMMAND DIAL DIRECTION**.
